Package controller.interfaces

Interface GameManagerController

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardServerController
public interface GameManagerController
This is the interface of a game manager controller

It defines all the methods needed to manage GameControllers

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createGame(NewGameInfo newGameInfo)
    This method builds a GameController using the given NewGameInfo
    GameController
    getGame(String gameId)
    This method returns a GameController associated with the given ID, the returned GameController has been built during a createGame(NewGameInfo) call and has been associated to the given NewGameInfo gameID

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      GameController getGame(String gameId) throws GameNotExistsException
      This method returns a GameController associated with the given ID, the returned GameController has been built during a createGame(NewGameInfo) call and has been associated to the given NewGameInfo gameID
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game
      Returns:
      the GameController associated with the given ID
      Throws:
      GameNotExistsException - if there is no GameController associated with the given ID

    • createGame

      void createGame(NewGameInfo newGameInfo) throws GameAlreadyExistsException, IllegalArgumentException
      This method builds a GameController using the given NewGameInfo
      Parameters:
      newGameInfo - the new-game info that needs to be used
      Throws:
      GameAlreadyExistsException - if there already is an GameController associated with the given NewGameInfo gameID
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given NewGameInfo contains illegal or unknown parameters
